title: No more bosses
description: Can companies operate better without managers?

vocabItems.definition: system of organising people according to their level of importance
the use of force to persuade someone to do something they do not want to do
a promise or firm decision to do something
remain at a lower level than others because you are not as quick to improve, develop or progress
take full advantage (of)make good use of an opportunity to progress or achieve a goal
accept responsibility for the consequences of your actions
